name: Crazy Wars TD
description:
The game can take up to 60 seconds to start in the browser please be patient,thank you.

update: 11/7/19

fixed wave not ending bug.

complete balance change on the wave system.

added controls for moving hero on touch devices.

fixed bug when restarting levels.

NO In App Purchases and no ads :)

Crazy Wars TD is a very fun and challenging tower defence game with multiple game modes.the beautiful and colourful hand drawn pixel graphics really shine when playing the game.hours of fun game play.

Over 20 tower placements per level.

Campaign mode has 12 challenging level.

When you clear the campaign try out the endless mode.

Use your controllable Hero to dominate the battleground,Did someone say tank!!

5 towers with multiple upgrades.

Many enemy types to keep you thinking about the best strategy.

Use your Gatling mine to clear out the enemy.

Use your barracks to eliminate the enemy's. 

PLEASE SUPPORT THIS GAME,MORE UPDATES ON THE WAY.

PLEASE LEAVE A MESSAGE IF YOU FIND ANY BUGS.

updates for touch devices coming soon

Any questions about the game then please leave a message.
